ai-patthana24.20:0.2_0: (These should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
ai-patthana24.20:0.3_0: necklace, grief, and rid of defilements.
ai-patthana24.20:1.1_0: Nor is a cause of defilement.
ai-patthana24.20:3.1_0: Nor do they give rise to perception.
ai-patthana24.20:10.1_0: No hindrance arises dependent on the hindrance of death and the hindrance of hindrance.
